Question: Obama in September 2009 said that his biggest inspiration came from Mahatma ****.
Hints: This person's father, Karamchand ****, had also died earlier that year.
This person was a self-described philosophical anarchist, and his vision of India meant an India without an underlying government.
In 1909, this person wrote to Tolstoy seeking advice and permission to republish A Letter to a Hindu in Gujarati.
